data.fullContent: Wilde's professional success was mirrored by an escalation in his feud with Queensberry. Queensberry had planned to insult Wilde publicly by throwing a bouquet of rotting vegetables onto the stage; Wilde was tipped off and had Queensberry barred from entering the theater. Fifteen weeks later Wilde was in prison.
data.answer: 王尔德在职业上的成功也反映在他与昆斯伯里不和的升级上。昆斯伯里曾计划向舞台上扔一束腐烂的蔬菜，借此公开侮辱王尔德;王尔德得到了消息，并下令禁止昆斯伯里进入剧院。15周后，王尔德进了监狱。
